===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# Fruit of the [[Euodia]], [[w:Evodia|Evodia]] or [[w:Tetradium|Tetradium]]. (An [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to treat hypertension; to reduces "dampness" and stomachache; to lead "fire" downwards, to warm the stomach.)
